message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more than that. How about a 55/45 split?
I'll compromise, 58-42 is as low as I can go for now.
Time is running out, and we both lose if this fails.  I'll come down a bit, how about 52/48?
I'll try to meet you halfway, but I still need a bit more than 50%.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair deal at this point. Take it or leave it.
